about_the_game:
BRIGADOR KILLERS is an intense story-driven isometric action game. Can a secret hit team of Solo Nobreans get revenge on the traitors deep in enemy territory, and still get out alive? The mercenary violence of BRIGADOR (2016) spills over onto a new planet, with revised controls and an all-new storyline mode.

WISHLIST NOW!

content_descriptors.notes:
Players can cause destruction across numerous levels both on foot and in a vehicle. Most combat is with other hostile NPCs and vehicles, but both hostile and non-hostile human-scale characters can be encountered and subsequently crushed by the player. Blood splats that human-scale characters leave behind can be turned off by toggling the DISABLE GRAPHIC CONTENT option in SETTINGS > GENERAL. 

In-game text entries may not be fit for those under the age of 16, as some contain descriptions of violent acts, crude humor and horror.

WISHLIST NOW!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 5770 / NVIDIA GTX 460 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse and keyboard or controller required.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Intel Mac OSX 10.7.4 or later.
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse and keyboard or controller required.

name: Brigador Killers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or later.
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 5770 / NVIDIA GTX 460 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse and keyboard or controller required.
